V

ValidationException - Exception in org.tquadrat.foundation.exception
This is a specialized implementation for the IllegalArgumentException that is meant as the root for a hierarchy of exceptions caused by validation errors.
ValidationException() - Constructor for exception org.tquadrat.foundation.exception.ValidationException
Creates a new ValidationException instance.

Creates a new ValidationException instance.

Creates a new ValidationException instance.

Creates a new ValidationException instance.
value - Variable in record class org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.NameValuePair
The field for the value record component.
value() - Element in annotation interface org.tquadrat.foundation.annotation.FixList
Provides the list of @BUG annotations.
value() - Element in annotation interface org.tquadrat.foundation.annotation.MountPoint
Optionally provides a short description on how to use this mount-point.
value() - Element in annotation interface org.tquadrat.foundation.annotation.PropertyName
The name for the property.
value() - Method in record class org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.NameValuePair
Returns the value of the value record component.
versionNumber() - Element in annotation interface org.tquadrat.foundation.annotation.ClassVersion
Returns the version number, usually injected during the build by the build tool.
